snippet: Last month, Lindsey Vonn completed a record-setting race season, the greatest by a woman in the history of the Alpine skiing’s World Cup. But her best year came in the midst of a thorny divorce.
abstract: Champion American skier Lindsey Vonn had her best World Cup racing season in 2011-12, the greatest by a woman in the history of the sport, but it came in the midst of a thorny divorce.
lead_paragraph: Last month, Lindsey Vonn completed a record-setting race season, the greatest by a woman in the history of the Alpine skiing’s World Cup. But her best year came in the midst of a thorny divorce.

headline.seo: For Lindsey Vonn, Professional Triumph and Personal Turmoil
headline.main: For Lindsey Vonn, Professional Triumph and Personal Turmoil
